# init(inkType:color:)

**Initializer**

Create a new ink, specifying its type, color.

## Declaration

```swift
init(inkType type: __PKInkType, color: UIColor)
```

```swift
init(inkType type: __PKInkType, color: NSColor)
```

## Parameters

- **type**: The type of ink to create, from one of the available [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkType] enumerations.
- **color**: The base color for this ink.
